Referral.question: My issue is not listed here.
Referral.answer: You can try searching for your issue. Alternatively you can raise a ticket with us. Our Customer Support champs will help you out in no time!

Referral.question: How does referral work?
Referral.answerHtml:
Here's how it works:

-Share the referral code with your friend
-When they invest more than Rs 2000, you will get a green card 
-A green card means you get a reward of Rs 100 at least
-1 in every 50 lucky referrals will win a bumper prize of Rs 10,000!
-Reward will be transferred to your Groww-linked bank account immediately using UPI 

Done!

You can see the progress of your referrals by pressing the 'GROWW REFERRALS' button below. 

Note: Groww referral works only on the app, not the website. Make sure the link you share is used to sign up.

Referral.question: What is the eligibility to get Groww referral reward?
Referral.answerHtml:
Here are the eligibility criteria:

-Your own Groww account should be fully updated - including bank details
-Your friend must use the link shared by you to sign up
-Your friend must use the app, not the website to sign up and invest
-Your friend must invest Rs 2000 or more

Referral.question: I did not get the Groww referral award.
Referral.answerHtml:
Please email us the following:

-Screenshot of the WhatsApp chat where you sent the referral code to your friend
-Your friend's mobile number

Note: Please send the same phone number your friend has registered on Groww.

Referral.question: I want to report an issue.
Referral.answerHtml: Please raise a ticket. We will help you with this matter.

Referral.question: Is Groww referral valid on the app only?
Referral.answerHtml:
Yes. You can refer people only over the app.

If your friend signs up and invests using the website, the referral won't be successful.
